description: I am a student at Vinnytsia National Technical University, specializing in Automation and Computer-Integrated Technologies. I have a strong passion for developing applications using .NET and I am eager to apply my programming skills to create innovative software solutions. Let's collaborate and build exceptional applications together.
skills: Programming Languages: C#, C++, Python, JavaScript (React)
Understanding of software development principles and OOP paradigm
Experience with GitHub and version control
Basics of working with MSQL databases
Ability to quickly learn and adapt to new technologies and tools
detailOrQuote: I am eager to contribute to exciting projects and accelerate my personal development as a developer.
